sentence.Network_en: A switch - hitter in baseball should be naturally ambidextrous.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个开关在棒球击球手应自然怀有二心的.

sentence.Network_en: We need a good switch - hitter on the team.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们队里需要一位优秀的左右手都能击球的(棒球)员.

sentence.Network_en: Pinch-hitter Francisco Cabrera lashed a single to left field.
